alert.note: Alert for Ford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 2:22PM CDT until July 23 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN FORD COUNTY... At 222 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Colfax, or 9 miles northwest of Gibson City, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. The most intense part of this storm is moving along the Ford and McLean county line. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gibson City, Melvin, Elliott and Sibley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
